Articles.Content:
Still playing the freebie at the mo, But will be purchasing the full game soon, AM TOTALLY HOOKED!!

Have managed to get to the moon, well smash into it so far lol.

Does the full game have more options??

Will gladly accept any tips, have sussed out orbiting, dont use full thrust lol, ended up in near planetary orbit haha.

Looking forward to the full game )

Buddy

Hey andyb798

In the forms go to How to... and click Orbiting 101. There are serveral videos there to help you get to the mun.

Welcome to the fourms, andyb798.

Check here to see how the game has changed from the demo version 0.13.3, there is a lot of differences like EVAs, IVAs, spaceplanes and in this update, new planets.

Also check the How To section for a lot more in-depth guidance like orbiting and landing on the Mun.

Hope you get the full game soon, its a lot more enjoyable than the demo version and since you are liking that, its the right game for you.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Edited October 17, 2012 by mustwinfull

Hi andyb798, welcome to the community

The current alpha release has a lot more stuff, aircraft parts, planets, EVA's, interior views, save and resume flights, it's a massive upgrade over the demo

WOW!!!!! Bought me the full game!!!! Sooooooo many parts to choose from!!!!! Looks like the wife has lost me now lol.

First things first..... practice orbit then moon base here we come.

or you lost your wife? be aware of kerbals, so few female kerbals they go for humans now..

have fun with the full version! but screw moon base, go for a duna base!

It's good that you got the full game now, you get all future updates for free and you have essentially backed KSP up.

Hope to see you reporting on that Mun base soon.

Good Luck. Mustwinfull Away...
